sn52.4:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca anuruddho ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahamoggallano sakete viharanti kandakivane.
sn52.4:1.2: Atha kho ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahamoggallano sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthita yenayasma anuruddho tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmata anuruddhena saddhim sammodimsu.
sn52.4:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam anuruddham etadavoca:
sn52.4:1.4: “sekhenavuso anuruddha, bhikkhuna katame dhamma upasampajja vihatabba”ti?
sn52.4:2.1: “Sekhenavuso sariputta, bhikkhuna cattaro satipatthana upasampajja vihatabba.
sn52.4:2.3: Idhavuso, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn52.4:2.6: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam—
sn52.4:2.7: sekhenavuso sariputta, bhikkhuna ime cattaro satipatthana upasampajja vihatabba”ti.
